CreditCard.CardType: Bank offers two type of classic and platinum cards.

Classic.Eligibilty: You need to have an Orange Everyday Account with us
Classic.InterestRates: For info on Interest rates of Classic visit https://www.ingdirect.com.au/credit-cards.html
Classic.Rewards: Currently there are no rewards/cashback for classic credit card

Platinum.Eligibilty: You need to have an Orange Everyday Account with us as well as a decent credit score
Platinum.InterestRates: For info on Interest rates of Platinum visit google.com
Platinum.Rewards: You can get upto 1% cashback maximum upto 30 AUD for platinum credit card.
